c74object.name: c.convolve~
c74object.digest: A zero latency convolution reverberation processor
c74object.description: c.convolve~ is a zero latency convolution reverberation processor

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

method.name: (mouse)
method.digest: Open the file buffer object window.
method.description: Double-clicking on the c.convolve~ opens a display window where you can view the contents of the buffer~ used to load the impulse response.

method.name: clear
method.description: The clear method clear the current reverberation tail (may produce clicks)

method.name: set
method.digest: Set a new impulse response by passing buffer~ object name.
method.description: The set method sets a new impulse response by passing buffer~ object name. An optionnal int can be passed after buffer name to set the buffer channel to be used.

attribute.name: buffer
attribute.description: The buffer attribute is the name of the buffer~ used to read the impulse response.

attribute.name: channel
attribute.description: The channel attribute is the channel number of the impulse response buffer.

attribute.name: cropsize
attribute.description: Use the cropsize attribute to limit the impulse response at a maximum size. It can be usefull to prevent too big CPU usage when loading big impulse responses. the cropsize is set in milliseconds, dont set this if you want to play the entire IR.

attribute.name: fftsize
attribute.description: The fftsize attribute is the c.convolve FFT size.

attribute.name: normalize
attribute.description: If the normalize attribute is checked, c.convolve object will normalize the buffer~ content.
